name: Sneaky Bastards: The Stealth Gaming Magazine
blurb: A brand new digital and print media publication that explores the stealth genre's biggest titles. First: Arkane Studios' Dishonored.

rewards.reward: Our heartfelt thanks for supporting a new kind of longform games writing.
Our heartfelt thanks, and your name listed in the magazine's skite box as a contributor.
A digital PDF copy of the magazine, plus your name listed in the skite box as a contributor.

A digital PDF copy of the magazine, your name listed in the skite box as a contributor, plus exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

Two A4 poster prints: one featuring Dishonored protagonist Corvo Attano, and the other featuring The Outsider! These A4 posters are exclusive to the \u00a330 tier! Plus, a digital PDF copy of the magazine, your name listed in the skite box as a contributor, plus exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

SPECIAL LIMITED REWARD TIER: A PC copy of the Thief Collection (featuring Thief: Gold, Thief II: The Metal Age, and Thief: Deadly Shadows) ready to redeem on Steam as soon as funding is successful; plus, a digital PDF copy of the magazine, your name listed in the skite box as a contributor, and exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

A physical, printed copy of the magazine, plus a digital PDF copy; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

A high quality A3 poster print of the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; plus, a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

A high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider

Exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; plus, a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

An additional high-quality A3 poster print, featuring a limited exclusive illustration of Dishonored's protagonist Corvo Attano; plus, an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

A third high-quality A3 poster print, featuring a limited exclusive illustration of Dishonored's enigmatic antagonist The Outsider; plus, an additional high-quality A3 poster print, featuring a limited exclusive illustration of Dishonored's protagonist Corvo Attano; an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.\r\n\r\nSo that's three posters, a t-shirt, a mug, a physical and digital copy of the magazine, exclusive high-resolution wallpapers, your name in the contributors list, and our eternal thanks!

A Steam copy of Dishonored's first DLC pack, Dunwall City Trials, to redeem as soon as funding is successful! Plus, three high-quality A3 poster prints each with unique Dishonored illustrations; an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

A Steam copy of Dishonored's second DLC pack, featuring the supernatural assassin Daud and The Whalers, to be redeemed on the PC release date that is still to be announced by Bethesda. Plus, a Steam copy of Dishonored's first DLC pack, Dunwall City Trials, to redeem as soon as funding is successful; three high-quality A3 poster prints each with unique Dishonored illustrations; an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

Play a stealth game with the Sneaky Bastards team! We'll organise a session to run through a multiplayer stealth game with you (Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory versus or co-op; Splinter Cell: Conviction; Thief II Multiplayer beta; Splinter Cell: Blacklist - upon its release - or another game of your choice) and record and feature the session on our site. Plus, a Steam copy of Dishonored's second DLC pack, featuring the supernatural assassin Daud and The Whalers, to be redeemed on the PC release date that is still to be announced by Bethesda; a Steam copy of Dishonored's first DLC pack, Dunwall City Trials, to redeem as soon as funding is successful; three high-quality A3 poster prints each with unique Dishonored illustrations; an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; and exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.

The ultimate contributor status, including a special one-on-one interview and profile of you to be featured in the magazine and on sneakybastards.net! Plus, every previous backer reward that we have to offer: Play a stealth game with the Sneaky Bastards team! We'll organise a session to run through a multiplayer stealth game with you (Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory versus or co-op; Splinter Cell: Conviction; Thief II Multiplayer beta; Splinter Cell: Blacklist - upon its release - or another game of your choice) and record and feature the session on our site; a Steam copy of Dishonored's second DLC pack, featuring the supernatural assassin Daud and The Whalers, to be redeemed on the PC release date that is still to be announced by Bethesda; a Steam copy of Dishonored's first DLC pack, Dunwall City Trials, to redeem as soon as funding is successful! Plus, three high-quality A3 poster prints each with unique Dishonored illustrations; an exclusive Sneaky Bastards mug, professionally designed and manufactured through a sublimation printing process and packaged in a stamped gift box; a high-quality t-shirt print in the size of your choice featuring an exclusive Dishonored illustration; a high quality A3 poster print inspired by the magazine's exclusive cover art illustration; a physical, printed copy of the magazine; a digital PDF copy of the magazine; your name listed in the skite box as a contributor; and exclusive high resolution desktop and mobile wallpapers featuring our unique cover art illustrations of Dishonored's characters Corvo Attano and The Outsider.
